column4: After upgrading to 10.04, mt-daapd no longer works.  I ran it in max-debug-mode and saw no activity as I tried to connect to it from itunes.
Can I see an svn-diff of the mt-daapd package between karmic and lucid?  Are there branch names I should use?
Also, I don't know where to get the info on connecting to ubuntu's svn.  OH!  They use bzr, don't they.
